name: ntfy
description: ntfy is a self-hosted notification system that lets you send push notifications via HTTP or CLI without registration. It supports web UI, mobile clients, and topics for real-time messaging.

features.title: REST API
features.description: Send push notifications via HTTP PUT/POST without registration or API keys

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Subscribe to topics to receive notifications without user accounts

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Web UI, Android, iOS apps, and CLI for receiving notifications anywhere

features.title: Instant Delivery
features.description: Real-time push notifications using HTTP streaming or WebSockets

features.title: Attachments
features.description: Send images, files, or links with notifications for rich content

features.title: Priority Levels
features.description: Set notification urgency from silent to critical with custom sounds

features.title: Scheduled Delivery
features.description: Delay notifications to send at specific times or after intervals

features.title: Action Buttons
features.description: Add clickable buttons to notifications for quick actions or links
